triples.name: Unit Testing
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on automated unit testing as the core testing approach for agent systems.

triples.name: Software Agent
triples.relevance: The paper addresses testing of software agents, which are autonomous entities used in sophisticated applications.

triples.name: Model-Based Testing
triples.relevance: The paper explicitly states it follows the principle of model-based testing in its testing approach.

triples.name: Software Testing
triples.relevance: Software testing is the foundational activity that the paper extends with automation for agent systems.

triples.name: Test Case
triples.relevance: The paper develops an algorithm to automatically generate test case inputs for comprehensive testing.

triples.name: Fault Model
triples.relevance: The paper develops a novel fault model that describes possible problems in different kinds of units.

triples.name: Software Framework
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an automated testing framework that enables completely automated unit testing of agent systems.

triples.name: Test Harness
triples.relevance: The paper's framework includes automated implementation of test harnesses for testing agent system units.
